title: Annual Tax Conference 2025
description: Our flagship annual conference covering the latest in direct and indirect taxation, with keynote speakers from the industry and government.

title: Workshop on AI in Auditing
description: An interactive workshop on leveraging Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning tools to enhance audit efficiency and accuracy.

title: Student Career Guidance Seminar
description: A special seminar for students and newly qualified CAs to explore diverse career paths and opportunities in the finance world.

title: Capital Markets Outlook
description: Join market experts as they discuss the trends, challenges, and opportunities in the Indian capital markets for the upcoming fiscal year.

title: Advanced Excel for Accountants
description: A hands-on training session to master advanced Excel functions, pivot tables, and data visualization for accounting professionals.

title: From ABC to GenZ: Rethinking Consumption Analysis
location: Shishuvan School, Teju Leela Hall, Matunga (C.R.), Mumbai
fullPricing: VIC Members: Free | CVOCA: ₹1,000 + GST | Non-CVOCA: ₹1,500 + GST
description: Join Harini Dedhia, Head of Research at Tamohara Investment Managers, for an insightful session on rethinking consumption analysis. Includes tea/coffee, networking, refreshments/working dinner at the canteen (8:00 PM - 8:30 PM). Limited valet parking available.

title: विरासत SE VIKAS TAK: Building Business Legacies
location: BN Vaidya Auditorium, Dadar East, Mumbai
fullPricing: Early Bird (till 15 Dec): CVOCA ₹500 + GST | Non-CVOCA ₹750 + GST | Group (3+) ₹600 + GST
description: A focused programme on business succession, next-gen leadership and governance in businesses. Join us for an insight-packed session followed by networking dinner. For queries contact: https://wa.me/919867687985

title: CVOCA INVESTOCRAFT 20-20
description: India's markets are rewriting history - new highs, new opportunities, and a new era of intelligent investing. A strategic investment conclave designed to decode emerging opportunities in India's dynamic markets. Get ready for an insight-packed day that sharpens your investment edge. Stay tuned for updates!
